Container.Description: Inspired by Pi-Hole - let's block those pesky ads![br][br] ** Note that you will need to creat 3 empty files in the data directory:[br] blacklist.txt[br]whitelist.txt[br]pihole.log[br][br] IF YOU DO NOT DO THIS, IT WILL NOT START!!!![br][br] Also, please install the cron tasks to delete logs - see forum.[br] This is a fork of diginc/docker-pi-hole who did all the hard work[br][br] which I then tuned to the unRaid template system and removed the IPV6 reference.[br][br] Just set your DNS on your PC/Mac/Mobile to point to your unRaid servers IP[br] and pihole will forward valid requests to your defined DNS servers.[br] Point your Routers DNS server address to unRaid to cover your whole network!.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]Setup IS required![/b] : Please see the environment variables.[br] Allows the use of Whitelists and Blacklists.[br] Web based admin on serverip/admin *** Make sure that you change unRaid's[br] default port as this uses port 80[br][br]
